name: individualQualifier
description: Identify the type of party or facility the Individual represents. Only “FD1” and “PK” are allowed values.

name: individualName
description: Name of the Individual. If the name exceeds the length, continue in a PG60 record with Qualifier Code “INA”.

name: telephoneNumberOfTheIndividual
description:
Telephone number of the Individual.
For example, (713)555-8765 in US or (+65)9052-3529 in Singapore

name: emailAddressForTheIndividual
description: Email Address of the individual. If the Email Address exceeds the length, continue in a PG60 record with Qualifier Code “EMA”.
